experiences.description: My role at Ditech is to design, create and build UI components using React, Typescript, and NodeJS using server-side rendering, mentor less experienced developers, participate in brown bag sessions to share knowledge among team members, review PRs of my own team and other squads. Examine product requirements and estimate according to the task level, participate in meetings and stand-up sessions with developers, technical leaders, and project managers.

My role at Meli is to design, create and build UI components using React, Typescript, and NodeJS using server-side rendering, monitor front-end applications using New Relic, Datadog, and Kibana, mentor less experienced developers, participate in brown bag sessions to share knowledge among team members, review PRs of my own team and other squads. Examine product requirements and estimate according to the task level, participate in meetings and stand-up sessions with developers, technical leaders, and project managers.

At Globant I worked in a mixed role as NodeJS Developer and DevOps Engineer. I participated in Infra 2.0 Automation and Massive iOS Concurrent Builds Automation Projects. I built APIs using serverless and lambda functions, performed automated unit testing, designed and built production-quality key-value storage, configuration, and maintenance of stage servers, CI/CD using Jenkins, Parallels, Puppet, Consul, Packer, MS Teams Notifications, Docker, Kubernetes. Examine client's requirements and make estimates according to the task's level, participate in stand up meetings and sessions with onshore/offshore developers, technical leaders, and project managers.

At Belatrix I worked in a mixed role as NodeJS Developer and DevOps Engineer. I participated in Infra 2.0 Automation and Massive iOS Concurrent Builds Automation Projects. I built APIs using serverless and lambda functions, performed automated unit testing, designed and built production-quality key-value storage, configuration, and maintenance of stage servers, CI/CD using Jenkins, Parallels, Puppet, Consul, Packer, MS Teams Notifications, Docker, Kubernetes. Examine client's requirements and make estimates according to the task's level, participate in stand up meetings and sessions with onshore/offshore developers, technical leaders, and project managers.

At Teravision, I worked on many projects listed below in the project section. I built APIs for mobile apps, performed automated unit testing, designed and built production-quality relational databases, configuration, and maintenance of development servers, I designed and created UI components with React, I worked with AWS(EC2, RDS, S3, EKS, EBS), I did multiple payment integrations (Stripe, PayPal, In-App Purchases), I used Jenkins and Docker as CI/CD tools. Examine client's requirements and make estimates according to the task's level, participate in stand up meetings and sessions with onshore/offshore developers, technical leaders, and project managers.

I built a web site to manage sports competitions using AngularJS and Laravel Framework, I performed automated unit tests and also I designed UI components and layouts. I had the opportunity to make payment integration with Web Pay. I had to participate in daily stand up meetings and sessions with offshore developers and Technical Leaders.

At Kentron I participated in many projects; I had to build web apps using Laravel Framework, Zend Framework, and NodeJS. I designed, built, and maintained production quality databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQL Server, Oracle, and MongoDB).  I performed data large migrations with Pentaho Data Integration. I built web services using SOAP, XML, and WSDL. I had to participate in daily stand up meetings and sessions with clients, onshore developers, and technical leaders.

I built a web system to manage medical resources orders. I used Yii Framework, jQuery, AJAX and JavaScript. I had to build views, stored procedures, and triggers on MySQL related database. I had to participate in daily stand up meetings and sessions with onshore developers and Technical Leaders.
